Name: Miss Moonshine
Ingredients: 10 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Gentian, elderflower and rosemary combine harmoniously, over a Poitín base with aromatised wine.
History: Created in 2014 by Louis Lebaillif at Hawksmoor Air Street, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Miss Moonshine contains 233 calories
